text: Guy-Roland Niangbo Nassa (born 21 May 1986) is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a left winger for Belgian side RUS Rebecq. ==Career== Niangbo began his career in 2001 with Toumodi FC and moved to the Belgium club R.O.C. de Charleroi-Marchienne on July 2005. There, he scored 12 goals in 33 games. He moved to SC Bastia on July 2008. On January 2011, he joined AFC Tubize in Belgian Second Division on loan. Ahead of the 2019–20 season, Niangbo joined Belgian club RUS Rebecq.Les mouvements à Rebecq, nordeclair.be, 18 June 2019 ==References== ==External links== * * * Guy-Roland Niangbo Nassa foot-national.com Profile Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Abidjan Category:Association football wingers Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:SC Bastia players Category:R.O.C. de Charleroi-Marchienne players Category:Toumodi FC players Category:Luzenac AP players Category:FC Istres players Category:US Boulogne players Category:GS Consolat players Category:FC Martigues players Category:R.U.S. Rebecquoise players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National players Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Ivorian expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium
title: Guy-Roland Niangbo
